HDG.WM.content: Dasein all that’s still there in anxiety, robs us of speech, because beings as a whole slip away, the nothing crowds around [proof?: I was anxious about nothing]

HDG.WL.content: [method] speak about speech qua speech (Die Sprache als die Sprache zur Sprache bringen): each Sprache says something different yet the Same > this Same, the oneness that’s the distinctive property of language, holds together (zueinanderhält) what is kept separate (Auseinandergehaltene)

HDG.WL.content: speech, not a secure possession (kein fester Besitz) > in shock, a man may be silent; in an accident, a man becomes mute (not silent) > language manifests itself in speaking (Die Sprache zeigt sich im Sprechen) as activation of organs of speech (mouth, lips, teeth, tongue, larynx)

HDG.WL.content: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]
